items.title: What Stranger Things gets right about wormholes

• The story is set in Indiana in a fictional town called Hawkins that gets caught up with a paranormal world

• In August 2024, Google agreed to a $2.7 billion licensing deal with Character.ai

items.title: Ancient skeletons reveal viruses embedded in human DNA
bullets: • Researchers have reconstructed ancient herpesvirus genomes from Iron Age and medieval Europeans, revealing that HHV-6 has been infecting humans for at least 2,500 years
• Some people inherited the virus directly in their DNA, passing it down across generations
• Study shows that these viruses evolved alongside humansâand that one strain eventually lost its ability to integrate into our chromosomes

items.title: Specieswatch: tough times for reindeer as rain increases in warming Arctic
bullets: • Reindeer survive typically harsh Arctic winters by using their specially adapted hooves to scrape through the snow to nibble on the lichen and moss below
• But paradoxically a warming climate is making it harder for them to reach this food, and research shows it has led to a drop in reindeer birthrates
